TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An aggressive cancer that usually affects the uterus/endometrium, peritoneum, or ovary.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "papillary serous carcinoma"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "carcinoma papilar seroso"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer de crecimiento rápido que, por lo general, afecta el útero, el endometrio, el peritoneo o el ovario.
